v8:item.v8:content: Hello! I am your opening balance input wizard.
Configuration settings will be populated with recommended values.
In this mode the configuration settings can be edited manually.
Before you enter the cash balance, please answer some questions about your company

If it is necessary to keep accounts of operations in several currencies, you should enable this option. The parameter affects the reflection of currency, exchange rates and multiplicity of currency in the corresponding objects, e.g. in the form of the prices and currency selection called out of the documents.
Specify the required national currency of your Countries. For example, it will be Russian rubles for Russia.

If the management accounting currency should differ from the national currency, for example, to be in euro, you should enable this option. <b><color #ff0000>IMPORTANT!</></> Key parameter. You can not disable this option if there is accounting data in the system.
Fill in the bank and petty cash opening balance.
Before you enter the goods opening balance, please answer some questions about your company
Accounting group by the various units of measurement
Accounting group by the various units of measurement
Your company has more than one warehouse

"Keep accounts of several warehouses". If it is necessary to keep accounts in several warehouses of the software product, you should enable this option.
This option enables a possibility to specify the warehouses in the documents.
If it is necessary to keep accounts in several warehouses of the software product, you should enable this option. This option enables a possibility to specify the warehouses in the documents.
Accounting group by the various units of measurement
Accounting group by the various units of measurement
Your goods can be measured in different units
This option defines the possibility of products and services accounting in various units for example in pieces, blocks, boxes or kilograms.

This option defines the possibility of products and services accounting in various units for example in pieces, blocks, boxes or kilograms. <b><color #ff0000>IMPORTANT!</></> Key parameter. You can not disable this option if there is accounting data in the system.
You are going to use characteristics of products and services

The option defines whether it is possible to keep accounts of inventories, works, and services by products and services characteristics. Usually additional characteristics are color, size, power, signs, etc.

The option defines whether it is possible to keep accounts of inventories, works, and services by products and services characteristics. Characteristics are the additional view of analytics and provide the most convenient structure of products and services. Usually additional characteristics are color, size, power, signs, etc. <b><color #ff0000>IMPORTANT! </></>Key parameter. You can not disable this option if there is accounting data in the system.
You are going to use Products and services batches

The parameter defines whether inventory accounting by specific products and services batches is possible. With batch accounting, each batch of the same inventory can be accounted in the warehouse separately.

The parameter defines whether inventory accounting by specific products and services batches is possible. With batch accounting, each batch of the same inventory can be accounted in the warehouse separately. Batch accounting is mandatory for inventory received for commission, processing, or safe custody from an external counterparty. For own inventories, it is determined by the company type. <b><color #ff0000>IMPORTANT! </></>Products and services batch <b>is not</> an analog of inventories posting document and is not used for determining the cost of inventory writeoff by FIFO method. <b><color #ff0000>IMPORTANT! </></>Key parameter. You can not disable this option if there is accounting data in the system.
Fill in opening balance of accounts payable
Fill in opening balance of accounts receivable
Well done! You entered opening balances successfully
Keep records of payments by bills
Keep records of payments by bills

v8:item.v8:content: Go to document list "Enter opening balance"
Import data from external source vendors settlements
Import data from external source customer settlements
